nodes.text: Christopher Bartlett (born September 3, 1970) is an actor who portrayed a Kubaz ferryman in the debut episode of the Disney+ live-action TV series The Mandalorian. He also served as the body double for Q9-0 in "Chapter 6: The Prisoner," and portrayed an RA-7 protocol droid bartender in "Chapter 7: The Reckoning" and a bounty hunter droid in "Chapter 3: The Sin" and was a body double for a protocol droid teacher in "Chapter 12: The Siege".
